#summary This is the examples of using Conditional Directives in DtCSS. It is here because of it is long.

==Input example==
{{{
#define DARK_STYLE 1

body {
    #ifdef DARK_STYLE
        background: #000;
        #define TEXT_COLOR #eee
    #endif
    #ifndef DARK_STYLE
        background: #fff;
        #define TEXT_COLOR #444
    #endif
    color: TEXT_COLOR;
}
}}}

===(R6)===
{{{
#define DARK_STYLE 1

body {
    #ifdef DARK_STYLE
        background: #000;
        #define TEXT_COLOR #eee
    #else
        background: #fff;
        #define TEXT_COLOR #444
    #endif
    color: TEXT_COLOR;
}
}}}

==Output==
{{{
body {
    background: #000;
    color: #eee;
}
}}}

By deleting the line that says...

{{{
#define DARK_STYLE 1
}}}

...is deleted or commented, it will output this instead:

{{{
body {
    background: #fff;
    color: #444;
}
}}}
